text:
AC LV SWBD - 1200 to 6000A, 480 / 600VAC
UL 891 Certified Switchboards for Solar / BESS Applications
Multi-section SWBD platform designed for AC collection of Solar or distribution / integration of BESS projects.
Thermally engineered for demanding outdoor applications, features up to 6000A bus and 5000A (6000A air
cooled) main breaker. Other features include: Multiple mains, feeder sizes from 15A to 2500A, M-T-M control
sections, generator quick connect options.
PRODUCT DETAILS
• 480VAC, 600VAC, 3P3W or 3P4W
• UL / NEMA 1 or 3R
• Main breaker ranges: 1200A – 5000A
(6000A air cooled), MLO up to 6000A
• Single ended or double ended (M-M or
M-T-M)
• Feeder ranges ACB: 1200A, 1600A,
2000A, 2500A
• Feeder ranges MCCB: 150AF, 250AF,
400AF, 600AF, 800AF, 1000AF
• Feeder trip type: Thermal Mag or
Electronic Trip
Pictured above: UL 891 / NEMA 3R (outer doors removed), 480 /
• Interrupt Ratings:
600VAC, 6000A SWBD, single ended, with: cable input section, 5000A
➢ 100kAIC @ 480VAC
main, ACB feeder section, MCCB feeder section & SEL control section.
➢ 65kAIC @ 600VAC
• Full front access, incoming / outgoing
Ample Power Capacity
bottom or top entry
• Direct bus / busway option (side) for Our 6000A Switchboard delivers the power capacity required,
main / ACB feeder for your Solar / BESS requirement. With fault current ratings
• Control section M-T-M control schemes of 100/65kAIC at 480/600V (supporting 4500/3500kVA sized
• Advanced diagnostics / metering /
MV Transformers at 480/600VAC, respectively.)
switching
Intelligence for Diagnostics, Metering and Switching
Our switchboards utilize Siemens’ state-of-the-art
power (3WA) and molded case (3VA6) circuit breakers.
Full metering and diagnostics for each circuit is available
from advanced trip units. The information is easily
made available to via Modbus TCPTM or other ethernet /
PLC protocol. If advanced communication is not
required standard trip units are available.
Electrical Panels ∙ Engineering ∙ Controls by EPEC Solutions, Inc.
Visit our site: www.epecsolutionsinc.com Contact: info@epecsolutionsinc.com

removed), 480 / 600VAC, 6000A SWBD, double

ACB feeder section, MCCB feeder, 2nd 5000A
main, 2nd cable input section & SEL control
section.
Enhanced Safety Features

protection (AERMS per NEC 240.87) and

easy upgrades and expansions, ensuring it can meet

EPEC is already a proven leader in the design and
Designed on the newest version of Siemens’ circuit
build LV AC switchboards in the demanding solar,
breaker technology, your equipment will stand up to
energy storage, and EV charging industries. We
the test of time.
understand that downtime is not an option for your
facility. That is why our 6000A Switchboard is
designed for maximum reliability. It’s robust
construction and advanced engineering ensure
consistent performance and minimal maintenance.
The EPEC 6000A switchboard is more than just a
power solution; it’s a strategic asset that will

enhance the performance, reliability and
switchboards are utilized in over 1 gigawatt of solar installations.
